titleStmt.title: A letter from New-Castle, containing the substance of severall speeches made by his Majesty, and by Duke Hammilton, the Earle of Lennerick, and the Earle of Calender: with divers passages of their proceedings for the setling of both kingdoms, and disposing of his Majesty. Septemb. 14. 1646. Examined by the originall papers, and printed and published according to order, and for generall satisfaction.
titleStmt.author: E. N.

titleStmt.title: A letter from New-Castle, containing the substance of severall speeches made by his Majesty, and by Duke Hammilton, the Earle of Lennerick, and the Earle of Calender: with divers passages of their proceedings for the setling of both kingdoms, and disposing of his Majesty. Septemb. 14. 1646. Examined by the originall papers, and printed and published according to order, and for generall satisfaction.
titleStmt.author: E. N.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for E.E. the 15. of September,

notesStmt.note: Dated and signed on page 6: Newcastle the 10. of Septemb. 1646. E.N.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
